item.title: [317] How to make a Ranking System for PKing [317]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

when i get 2 the part where u add

client killa = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; public boolean ApplyDead() { youdied(); // Ranking System Made by Rapidrocket7 Streak = 0; // Resets you killstreak killa.PKPoints += PKPointsGain; // Adds the points to your // killer's PKPoints killa.Experience += XPGain; // Same as above, but with the // eperience killa.Streak += streakAmount; // I'm sure you get the point by // here. killa.checkRank(); // Updates your killer's rank before it // checks the exp. killa.checkExperience(); // Updates your killer's exp/rank. killa.checkRank(); // Re-updates your killer's callsing/prefix killa.checkStreak(); // Update's your killer's killstreak. killa.bestStreak(); // Checks if you have a new best killstreak. killa.sendMessage("You killed [" + Rank + "] " + playerName + "."); // Tells your killer who they killed (you), Also // your killer him your rank sendMessage("You were killed by [" + Rank + "] " + killa.playerName + "!"); // Tells you who killed you. // Also tells you your // killer's rank deathcount += 1; // Adds one death to your deathcount. deathstoday += 1; // you can guess. }

it gives me 2 errors:

client.java:18722: illegal start of expression public boolean ApplyDead() { ^ client.java:18722: ';' expected public boolean ApplyDead() { ^ 2 errors You have successfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“xhunterzx, post:11, topic:360679”]I got this error anyone kno how to fix?

client.java:29: illegal start of expression public int killedperson = 1; ^ client.java:30: illegal start of expression public int PKPointsGain = 1; // This determines how muck PKPoints will b e ^ client.java:33: illegal start of expression public static int PKPoints = 1; ^ client.java:33: illegal start of expression public static int PKPoints = 1; ^ client.java:33: ';' expected public static int PKPoints = 1; ^ client.java:34: illegal start of expression public int XPGain = 10; // This determines how much Experience will be a dded ^ client.java:37: illegal start of expression public static int Experience = 0; ^ client.java:37: illegal start of expression public static int Experience = 0; ^ client.java:37: ';' expected public static int Experience = 0; ^ client.java:38: illegal start of expression public static int Streak = 0; ^ client.java:38: illegal start of expression public static int Streak = 0; ^ client.java:38: ';' expected public static int Streak = 0; ^ client.java:39: illegal start of expression public String Rank = "Unranked"; ^ client.java:40: illegal start of expression public static int deathcount = 0; ^ client.java:40: illegal start of expression public static int deathcount = 0; ^ client.java:40: ';' expected public static int deathcount = 0; ^ client.java:41: illegal start of expression public static int deathstoday = 0; // How many times you have for the da y. ^ client.java:41: illegal start of expression public static int deathstoday = 0; // How many times you have for the da y. ^ client.java:41: ';' expected public static int deathstoday = 0; // How many times you have for the da y. ^ client.java:43: illegal start of expression public static int bestStreak = 0; // Your highest killstreak ^ client.java:43: illegal start of expression public static int bestStreak = 0; // Your highest killstreak ^ client.java:43: ';' expected public static int bestStreak = 0; // Your highest killstreak ^ client.java:44: illegal start of expression public static int killcount = 0; // Your total kills since you made the ^ client.java:44: illegal start of expression public static int killcount = 0; // Your total kills since you made the ^ client.java:44: ';' expected public static int killcount = 0; // Your total kills since you made the ^ client.java:46: illegal start of expression public static int killstoday = 0; // How many kills you have for the day . ^ client.java:46: illegal start of expression public static int killstoday = 0; // How many kills you have for the day . ^ client.java:46: ';' expected public static int killstoday = 0; // How many kills you have for the day . ^ client.java:48: illegal start of expression public int rankedUp = 1; // This is to make sure it doesnt say that you ^ client.java:51: illegal start of expression public int streakAmount = 1; ^ client.java:71: illegal start of expression public void checkExperience() { // This checks weather you have unlocke d a ^ client.java:71: illegal start of expression public void checkExperience() { // This checks weather you have unlocke d a ^ client.java:71: ';' expected public void checkExperience() { // This checks weather you have unlocke d a ^ client.java:190: illegal start of expression public void checkRank() { // This is the method that checks your rank ^ client.java:190: illegal start of expression public void checkRank() { // This is the method that checks your rank ^ client.java:190: ';' expected public void checkRank() { // This is the method that checks your rank ^ client.java:259: illegal start of expression public void checkStreak() { // This checks if you have a new killstreak Feel ^ client.java:259: illegal start of expression public void checkStreak() { // This checks if you have a new killstreak Feel ^ client.java:259: ';' expected public void checkStreak() { // This checks if you have a new killstreak Feel ^ PlayerHandler.java:15: <identifier> expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[" + Rank + "]" + playerName + ": " ^ PlayerHandler.java:15: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[" + Rank + "]" + playerName + ": " ^ 41 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Post about 10 lines down from the top after this line

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.*;

//2400,4446

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

and

[quote=“jmk600, post:24, topic:360679”]Help me please!

client.java:70: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); // If it is it calls this method, which wil l be ^ client.java:81: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:91: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:96: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:101: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:106: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:117: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:122: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:127: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:132: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:137: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:141: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:146: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:151: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:156: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:161: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:166: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ client.java:171: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkRank() location: class client checkRank(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 20 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You forgot to add this

// Ranking System Made by Rapidrocket7
public void checkRank() { // This is the method that checks your rank
                                                                // (callsign for the yell command and also when
                                                                // you level up/get a killstreak)

                // Setting Ranks.
                if (Experience >= 50 && Experience <= 100) { // If your experience is
                                                                                                                // between these two
                                                                                                                // numbers,
                        Rank = "Pvt. "; // <-- this is your new callsign
                }
                if (Experience >= 100 && Experience <= 200) {
                        Rank = "Sp. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 200 && Experience <= 350) {
                        Rank = "Cpl. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 350 && Experience <= 550) {
                        Rank = "Sgt. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 550 && Experience <= 750) {
                        Rank = "SSgt.";
                }
                if (Experience >= 750 && Experience <= 1250) {
                        Rank = "SFC. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 1250 && Experience <= 1750) {
                        Rank = " MSgt. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 1750 && Experience <= 2250) {
                        Rank = "1Sgt. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 2250 && Experience <= 3000) {
                        Rank = "SgtM. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 3000 && Experience <= 3750) {
                        Rank = "2Lt. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 3750 && Experience <= 4750) {
                        Rank = "1Lt.";
                }
                if (Experience >= 4750 && Experience <= 5750) {
                        Rank = "Cpt. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 5750 && Experience <= 7000) {
                        Rank = "Mjr. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 7000 && Experience <= 8250) {
                        Rank = "LtC. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 8250 && Experience <= 9750) {
                        Rank = "Col. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 9750 && Experience <= 11250) {
                        Rank = "BG. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 11250 && Experience <= 13000) {
                        Rank = "MG. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 13000 && Experience <= 14750) {
                        Rank = "LG. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 14750 && Experience <= 20000) {
                        Rank = "Gen. ";
                }
                if (Experience >= 20000) {
                        Rank = "Cdr. ";
                }
        }

item.title: [317] How to make a Ranking System for PKing [317]
item.dc:creator: @rapidrocket7 rapidrocket7
item.description:
@rapidrocket7 wrote:

Clawz fury:

Good luck cramming all this shit into your client.java guys!

Clawz, only noobs will put it in their Client.java since most people (who actually know Java) spread it over a range of files (I’ve forgotten what it’s called), also, this was my first tutorial, I was new to java at the time, now stop hatin’, I doubt you can do much better, so get out of your mum’s basement and GET A LIFE!

EDIT: Just updated the tut with the fix for saving the stats, cheers sjustin1996 for pointing that out, and yes, I’ve starting coding RSPS again

item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:13, topic:360679”]I took the time to add this all and I have problems…first of all in client.java I added the character files needed such as what you added in playerhandler.java. But, every time I re-log all my pk, death points, killcount, etc resets no matter what! PkPoints and KillCount don’t work though… Please Help!

TheCyberMan

EDIT (made 5 minutes later): Lmfao, if I re-read the top, I would’ve noticed you said it doesn’t save. Now I know it’s not something I’ve done. I’ll try and fix it…

Ok now I’ve added what I needed in client.java, playerhandler.java (you told us), and player.java, but none of it saves…someone help please![/quote]

Change the = 0 to = (variablename) so it loads it from your files rather than just setting it to 0.

Read full topic
